message:
I meant to say 820-00045
No green light on the charger, and no fan spin. What should I do?

*** UPDATE *** There is no mag safe for 820-00045 & there are no fans present in this model...
do you have a USB-C meter, it's easier to diagnose the board when you have one?
No. But is a good idea. I need to get one.
There literally isn't a light on these chargers. So therefore, no light. Also, there are no fans, thus no fans. Hehe : )
Wow. I have the Power Z dongle and never realized it has a USB-C on it. I was about to buy one, but I already have one. Thanks Alan. I'm going to start using it !
I might need to add a light and a fan. Since it don't have either.
whats the voltage and amp is shown on the meter? you have to start measuring...
Alan, this was a little bit of dry Monday morning humor. I was actually referring to the 820-00045. There is no light for this model. And this model also has no fans : )
the light is next to the battery connector. it's very tiny.
I know, thats the battery disconnect.

Do you get any voltage at F4700?
What about U7100 voltages?

Common failure on this board is U4700...
Ugg... This is a joke post.... I am playing a joke.... There are no mag safe light for this model, and no fan. LOL!
